channel.title: ~Espeon, Help
channel.description:
It says add under login method but I don't know how. Can anyone tell me what exact code I add it under?
Go to net > com > espeon > net > codec > RS2LoginProtocol
Place this in the Login method. (At the bottom of it.)
[QUOTE]FloodDetect.checkClient(p);[/QUOTE]
Please tell me what exact spot I gonna add it in.
Under what code do I add?

item.title: ~Espeon, Help
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

[quote=“bloodpkscape.no-ip.org, post:1, topic:274697”]Place this in the Login method. (At the bottom of it.)

FloodDetect.checkClient§;[/QUOTE]

Read full topic

@bloodpkscape.no-ip.o wrote:

It says add under login method but I don’t know how.
Can anyone tell me what exact code I add it under?

Go to net > com > espeon > net > codec > RS2LoginProtocol

Place this in the Login method. (At the bottom of it.)

Please tell me what exact spot I gonna add it in.
